2161.verse: وَكَذَٲلِكَ|And similarly,|106|114|1273$أَعْثَرْنَا|We made known|128|143|10683$عَلَيْهِمْ|about them|96|111|22$لِيَعْلَمُوٓاْ|that they might know|163|178|10684$أَنَّ|that|48|63|240$وَعْدَ|(the) Promise|109|116|4486$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|92|606$حَقٌّ|(is) true,|79|100|3076$وَأَنَّ|and that|77|98|3504$ٱلسَّاعَةَ|(about) the Hour|132|154|9836$لَا|(there is) no|103|124|30$رَيْبَ|doubt|67|88|31$فِيهَآ|in it.|57|68|253$إِذْ|When|57|64|1198$يَتَنَـٰزَعُونَ|they disputed|115|130|10685$بَيْنَهُمْ|among themselves|142|157|1056$أَمْرَهُمْ‌ۖ|about their affair|132|147|9289$فَقَالُواْ|and they said,|115|130|4596$ٱبْنُواْ|"Construct|90|97|10686$عَلَيْهِم|over them|87|96|22$بُنْيَـٰنًا‌ۖ|a structure.|99|118|10687$رَّبُّهُمْ|Their Lord|86|104|3627$أَعْلَمُ|knows best|95|114|324$بِهِمْ‌ۚ|about them."|106|124|125$قَالَ|Said|52|70|309$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|98|20$غَلَبُواْ|prevailed|79|109|10688$عَلَىٰٓ|in|63|124|52$أَمْرِهِمْ|their matter,|104|165|10689$لَنَتَّخِذَنَّ|"Surely we will take|149|210|10690$عَلَيْهِم|over them|87|117|22$مَّسْجِدًا|a place of worship."|151|151|7894$

2162.verse: سَيَقُولُونَ|They say,|105|124|10691$ثَلَـٰثَةٌ|(they were) three,|144|181|4672$رَّابِعُهُمْ|the forth of them|135|172|10692$كَلْبُهُمْ|their dog;|85|122|10693$وَيَقُولُونَ|and they say|107|126|3019$خَمْسَةٌ|(they were) five|128|147|10694$سَادِسُهُمْ|the sixth of them|134|172|10695$كَلْبُهُمْ|their dog -|91|129|10693$رَجْمَۢا|guessing|77|115|10696$بِٱلْغَيْبِ‌ۖ|about the unseen;|143|162|36$وَيَقُولُونَ|and they say,|112|121|3019$سَبْعَةٌ|(they were) seven|143|161|10697$وَثَامِنُهُمْ|and the eight of them|165|183|10698$كَلْبُهُمْ‌ۚ|their dog.|84|102|10693$قُل|Say,|50|68|765$رَّبِّىٓ|"My Lord,|82|91|2902$أَعْلَمُ|knows best|95|101|324$بِعِدَّتِهِم|their number.|108|120|10699$مَّا|None|53|65|262$يَعْلَمُهُمْ|knows them|99|111|7347$إِلَّا|except|65|77|86$قَلِيلٌ‌ۗ|a few.|62|74|3646$فَلَا|So (do) not|97|109|208$تُمَارِ|argue|64|70|10700$فِيهِمْ|about them|96|111|1180$إِلَّا|except|65|94|86$مِرَآءً|(with) an argument|148|177|10701$ظَـٰهِرًا|obvious,|82|111|10702$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|133|25$تَسْتَفْتِ|inquire|84|99|10703$فِيهِم|about them|96|184|1180$مِّنْهُمْ|among them|101|278|730$أَحَدًا|(from) anyone."|124|212|4849$

2166.verse: قُلِ|Say,|50|68|1922$ٱللَّهُ|"Allah|56|93|2323$أَعْلَمُ|knows best|95|132|324$بِمَا|about what (period)|153|190|43$لَبِثُواْ‌ۖ|they remained.|119|156|10631$لَهُۥ|For Him|69|87|977$غَيْبُ|(is the) unseen|121|138|8792$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|167|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ‌ۖ|and the earth.|116|151|352$أَبْصِرْ|How clearly He sees!|158|193|10714$بِهِۦ|[of it]|59|76|204$وَأَسْمِعْ‌ۚ|And how clearly He hears!|193|200|10715$مَا|Not|43|58|262$لَهُم|for them|76|91|98$مِّن دُونِهِۦ|besides Him|116|131|4463$مِن|any|50|65|53$وَلِىٍّ|protector,|87|102|1006$وَلَا|and not|71|78|25$يُشْرِكُ|He shares|85|136|10716$فِى|[in]|48|150|89$حُكْمِهِۦٓ|His Commands|114|216|10717$أَحَدًا|(with) anyone."|123|174|4849$

2167.verse: وَٱتْلُ|And recite|88|94|4880$مَآ|what|53|65|262$أُوحِىَ|has been revealed|141|153|5833$إِلَيْكَ|to you|63|75|45$مِن|of|50|62|53$كِتَابِ|the Book|78|90|2722$رَبِّكَ‌ۖ|(of) your Lord.|117|129|1322$لَا|None|53|59|30$مُبَدِّلَ|can change|97|107|5544$لِكَلِمَـٰتِهِۦ|His Words|99|118|5971$وَلَن|and never|86|105|229$تَجِدَ|you will find|98|117|4073$مِن دُونِهِۦ|besides Him|116|135|4463$مُلْتَحَدًا|a refuge.|83|93|10718$

2161.verse: And similarly, We caused them to be found that they [who found them] would know that the promise of Allah is truth and that of the Hour there is no doubt. [That was] when they disputed among themselves about their affair and [then] said, "Construct over them a structure. Their Lord is most knowing about them." Said those who prevailed in the matter, "We will surely take [for ourselves] over them a masjid."

2162.verse: They will say there were three, the fourth of them being their dog; and they will say there were five, the sixth of them being their dog - guessing at the unseen; and they will say there were seven, and the eighth of them was their dog. Say, [O Muhammad], "My Lord is most knowing of their number. None knows them except a few. So do not argue about them except with an obvious argument and do not inquire about them among [the speculators] from anyone."

2163.verse: And never say of anything, "Indeed, I will do that tomorrow,"

2164.verse: Except [when adding], "If Allah wills." And remember your Lord when you forget [it] and say, "Perhaps my Lord will guide me to what is nearer than this to right conduct."

2165.verse: And they remained in their cave for three hundred years and exceeded by nine.

2166.verse: Say, "Allah is most knowing of how long they remained. He has [knowledge of] the unseen [aspects] of the heavens and the earth. How Seeing is He and how Hearing! They have not besides Him any protector, and He shares not His legislation with anyone."

2167.verse: And recite, [O Muhammad], what has been revealed to you of the Book of your Lord. There is no changer of His words, and never will you find in other than Him a refuge.
